name: init_fund
body: let f = & mut ctx . accounts . fund ;
f . curator = ctx . accounts . curator . key () ;
f . mood = f . tag . rotate_right (1) . wrapping_add (3) ;

name: donate_with_note
body: let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("fund") . ok_or (error ! (E :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"fund" , ctx . accounts . curator . key . as_ref () , & ctx . accounts . fund . tag . to_le_bytes () , & [bump]] ;
let ix = Instruction { program_id : MEMO_ID , accounts : vec ! [] , data : memo } ;
let base = ctx . accounts . fund . mood . rotate_left (1) . wrapping_add (17) ;
s = s . wrapping_add ((base . rotate_left (i as u32) ^ (i as u64 * 7)) . wrapping_add (11)) ;

fields.name: fund
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = curator , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"fund" , curator . key () . as_ref () , tag . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: fund
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"fund" , curator . key () . as_ref () , fund . tag . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
